title: Champ Idea. The Dread Master
body:
The Dread Master is a source of terror on the battlefield, born to spread fear among all that would dare oppose him

HP _____
MP 320 + ____
AD ~40-60 + ~1-3
Atk Speed 0.7 
Armor 24 + 2
MR 30 + 0
Speed 340


Passive: Dread
All nearby enemies lose Armor, magic resistance and Movement speed when facing him. 800 Range
Lose : 10/20/30/40 Armor and 5/10/15/20 MR
Lose : 15/25/35/45 movement speed.

Q: Swarm of terror.  Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 MP 17/15.5/14/12.5/11 seconds
Passive: every 3 rd cast deals bonus damage, enemies killed restore mana and grants a decaying speed buff for a short duration.

1/2nd Cast: The Dread Master unleashes a swarm of fear energies, firing them out in a cone up to 600 distance away. Wave lasts 0.2 seconds and all units hit are feared for 0.05 seconds when the swarm brushes past them.
Wave deals 30/50/70/90/110 + 100% BONUS AD Physical damage.

3rd Cast: The dread aster unleashes a swarm of fear energies, This time firing a cone up to 900 distance away. Wave lastsl 0.3 seconds and all units hit are feared for 0.45 seconds.  
Wave deals 55/80/130/205/305 + 150% BONUS AD Physical Damage.
Killing any units restores Lvl x 4 Health  and Level x 2 Mana.



W: Fear Me  50MP  18/16/14/12/10 seconds.
The Dread Master channels for 2.5 seconds, he can still move but cant attack.
 Once the duration is up, his next attack becomes ranged 700 and a projectile( Not a skill shot)
The enemy struck takes 50/80/110/140/170 + 100%AD Magic damage. The enemy is feared for 1 second afterwards.


E: Claws to the end.  35/40/45/50/55 MP per hit. 1 second between toggles.
Toggole active
Each attack drains mana.
Attacks hit the enemy dealing 10/25/40/55/70 bonus Magical Damage.
The enemy is then enchanted for 3 seconds.
The enemy will slowly transfer health to the Dread Master.
Transfers 1/1.75/2.5/3.25/4% MAX HP + 4/10/18/28/40 + 10% Bonus AD health per second.


R: Reign of Terror. 125MP 170/140/110 seconds. Range of 450 radius.
Upon Activation, Fear energies begin to swarm around the Dread Master over 2 seconds.
After 2 seconds, Nearby enemies begin to take damage and gain stacks of Fear every second.
Every second they take 25/45/65 + 15% BONUS AD Physical Damage.
Enemies struck gain 1 stack of Fear per second.

Every stack of fear increases the damage taken by the swarm by 5 + 2% BONUS AD per tick.
Upon reaching 4-8-12 stacks, they are feared for 0.5 seconds.
Lasts 12 seconds.
Maximum damage taken over 12 seconds is 680/975/1235 + 351% BONUS AD over 12 seconds.


So yeah...... Any ideas or suggestions would help.

replies.body:
1. The passive is sooper dooper boring, maybe have something tied to facing him as opposed to just dropping A/MR/MS. 
2. The Q err, yeah it's alright I guess. It's a long cooldown for an ability tied to being recast for extra effects.
3. W is ok. Yeah. Ok. I guess. Yeah. Seems a bit slow for the effect. Galio charges to jump forward and justice punch. Vi charges to launch forward and punch. Nunu charges to PONCH everything. Camille can charge her Q to do a sick flip. 
4. Attack speed on hit? Ok then. 
5. The ult is umm, yeah I guess interesting a bit extended but yeah. 
If you want to build a kit around terrifying the enemy, I'd suggest coming up with a different sort of interesting mechanic to go along with it. Warwick is scary as heck because when you're low health, music plays and you know he knows you're low. The fear mechanic on it's own isn't all that interesting or fun.
Interesting. Feels a lot like fiddle sticks but like bunch more fear. It is important that you think what it is like to be against this champion and fear is a pretty painful form of cc.
